moves.1... Nc6: black trys to stop whites massive diagonal.
moves.2. Bg2 b6: black is now jealous and wants to share the file.
moves.3. Bxc6: dugite takes the knight forcing DxC6 and the file is closed.
moves.3... dxc6: the black queen is quite strong now.
moves.4... Bh3: black stops white from castling while also threatening Bg2.
moves.6. Rg1: only safe square for the rook to go.
moves.7... c5: Blacks threat; dxe4 Qxd1 Kxd1 and whites king is open.
moves.10... e6: since the pawn could not be defended black plays simple developing moves.
moves.12... Bd6: black stops his queen being in so much danger from the rook.
moves.17... Nd7: black tries to make a fortress around his king
